chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> is_set A l -> is_set A l' -> is_permutation A l l'

Premises:
is_set : forall A : Set, list A -> Prop
is_permutation : forall A : Set, list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
insertion_is_set : forall (A : Set) (l : list A), is_set A l -> forall x : A, ~ In x l -> forall l' : list A, insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l'
is_set_insertion : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> is_set A l
is_set_insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> ~ In x l
NoDup_Permutation : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> Permutation l l'
is_permutation_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
is_permutation_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
insertion_inclusion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> forall y : A, In y l -> In y l'
cons_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l''
in_insertion_inv : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A y l l' -> In x l' -> x = y \/ In x l
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> In x l'
cons_is_set : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> ~ In x l -> is_set A (x :: l)
is_set_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
is_set_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
Permutation_in : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), Permutation l l' -> In x l -> In x l'
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
insertion_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l')
Inductive insertion (A : Set) : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop := head_insertion : forall (x : A) (l : list A), insertion A x l (x :: l) | tail_insertion : forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l') Arguments insertion _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments head_insertion _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments tail_insertion _%type_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l' : list A, Add a l' l
NoDup_Add : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> NoDup l' < -> NoDup l /\ ~ In a l
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> P x)
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : Permutation nil nil | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l') | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l) | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> Permutation l l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
forallb_forall : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), forallb f l = true < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> f x = true)
ForallOrdPairs_In : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A), ForallOrdPairs R l -> forall x y : A, In x l -> In y l -> x = y \/ R x y \/ R y x
elements_in_partition : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> forall x : A, In x l < -> In x l1 \/ In x l2
